name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2 Deluxe Pack / 超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth2 デラックスセット / 數位附錄套組
detailed_description:
With this Deluxe Pack DLC you will get the following contents!

1. Original 29 page Digital Art Book for the PC version including illustrations and rough drafts.
2. Digital Soundtrack with 34 tracks.
3. Neptunia Windows Theme that includes 8 icons and special wallpapers.

The Deluxe Pack contents will be downloaded into your steamapps > common > Neptunia Rebirth2 > DeluxeSet folder.
about_the_game:
With this Deluxe Pack DLC you will get the following contents!

1. Original 29 page Digital Art Book for the PC version including illustrations and rough drafts.
2. Digital Soundtrack with 34 tracks.
3. Neptunia Windows Theme that includes 8 icons and special wallpapers.

The Deluxe Pack contents will be downloaded into your steamapps > common > Neptunia Rebirth2 > DeluxeSet folder.
short_description: This DLC contains digital bonus items related to Neptunia such as art book, soundtracks, windows theme, and windows wallpapers.

fullgame.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation / 超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth2 / 超次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生2

supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7(64bit)
  • Processeur : Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Mémoire vive : ４ GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX : Version 10
  • Espace disque : 7 GB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Notes supplémentaires : Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7(64bit) or later
  • Processeur : 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Mémoire vive : ６ GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX : Version 10
  • Espace disque : ７ GB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Notes supplémentaires : Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
